author: shirogat
title: Empower 400 Marginalized Girls
description: These girls and young women have limited life chances due to forced early marriage, child labor and gender based violence among other issues
solution: Create  a digital education  outreach hub that supports 400 marginalized girls from Kenyan pastoralist communities through training
experience: Education advisor ICT for DFiD girl education challenge program, Kenya Government Ministry of Youth and ICT
